FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: + **VILLANESCA**, by Distorted Humor. 4 wins in 8 starts at 3 and 4, $237,500, 1st Magnolia Jackson S. (BEL, $60,000), 3rd Ballerina S. **[G1]** (SAR, $50,000). Half-sister to **Frost Point** ($193,810, 3rd Allaire DuPont Distaff S. **[G3]** (PIM, $15,000), etc.).
